title: WATCH: Lasizwe teaches Disney star Skai Jackson some local dance moves
text:
WATCH: Lasizwe teaches Disney star Skai Jackson some local dance moves share this

Johannesburg – While in the US, local internet sensation Lasizwe got the chance to chill with Disney star Skai Jackson, showing her a couple of SA dance moves.

Posting a video clip on Instagram, Lasizwe is seen showing off his moves as Skai joins in.

"I taught @skaijackson a South African dance move," he wrote.

Many fans were impressed with the former Jessie actress' skills, saying she pulled it off perfectly.

Lasizwe has travelled to Atlanta alongside SA influencer Mihlali.

WATCH SKAI JACKSON AND LASIWE DANCING BELOW:
description: While in the US, local internet sensation Lasizwe got the chance to chill with Disney star Skai Jackson, showing her a couple of SA dance moves.
